alert.note: Alert for Bell; Floyd; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Perry; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 3:30PM EST until February 17 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds of 10 to 20 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph are expected from mid-morning Thursday into the afternoon. Even stronger southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 50 to 60 mph are possible from late Thursday afternoon into Thursday night. * WHERE...Bell, Harlan, Floyd, Knott, Perry, Leslie, Letcher and Pike Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 4 PM EST Thursday. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Scattered to widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bell; Floyd; Harlan; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Perry; Pike
